text: "Last Christmas" is a holiday song by the pop duo Wham!. It is about betrayal of the protagonist by a person he thought was there to stay. The song was released in December 3 1984. Other singers have covered it since then, including Ashley Tisdale. ==References== Category:Christmas songs Category:Wham! songs Category:1984 songs Category:Ariana Grande songs Category:Billie Piper songs Category:Taylor Swift songs Category:Tina Arena songs Category:Carly Rae Jepsen songs Category:Alanis Morissette songs Category:Sabrina Carpenter songs Category:Chappell Roan songs
title: Last Christmas
